title: Can you listen to radio on phone without Internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: You do need FM radio hardware to listen to radio (and forget about AM because even if the phone manufacturer is stupid enough to put AM radio hardware inside the phone, EMI would make it unbearable to listen to any station). Some phones have the hardware and some phones don’t. For instance, Samsung Galaxy S9 does but S7 doesn’t and their specifications clearly tell you that: Samsung Galaxy S9: Radio FM radio (USA & Canada only) Samsung Galaxy S7
